# Simple Review

This package is really simple to use and you can have a stars review ready to use but will customizable features too.

All you need to do is to create a section or div tag with the class SimpleReview.

# Example

Try it out

Play around with code on codepen (opens new window).

See the Pen SimpleReview by Maxi Ruti Park (@maxrpark) on CodePen.
